C

Car - Class in <Unnamed>
Cars are the threads of the program, each one has an id and direction they try to cross a bridge with one lane by using the bridge monitor class
Car(int, int, int, int, int, Bridge) - Constructor for class Car
Create a new Car object
crossToNorth(int) - Method in class Bridge
A car calling this method will join the line of other cars before attempting to cross the bridge.
crossToSouth(int) - Method in class Bridge
A car calling this method will join the line of other cars before attempting to cross the bridge.
